name: Golden House
title: Golden House
desc: All the contracts that circulate throughout the land are forged here.

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When you play a Weapon card or an Artifact card with an original cost of at least 3: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF"><span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s): 2
